comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Norman Rond Hamilton (November 13, 1877 - March 26, 1964) was a U.S. Representative from Virginia." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norman_R._Hamilton A similar photo shows him as collector of customs under the headline "Enforcing Neutrality at Newport News, Va." in The Washington times., April 07, 1915, HOME EDITION, Image 1. He was also involved in the Appam incident, he released the passengers of the ship which was captured by the Germans, see The Washington times., February 02, 1916, HOME EDITION, Image 1 (with photo) and Evening public ledger., February 04, 1916, Night Extra, Page 5, with photo.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: B-59: Thank you for helping to connect the dots between various passengers on the Appam during the 1916 incident. We will add notes to the records to retain that connection.
